text: Marie of Cleves (19 September 1426 – 23 August 1487) was the third wife of Charles, Duke of Orléans, and the mother of his only son, King Louis XII of France. She was born a German princess, the last child of Adolph I, Duke of Cleves and his second wife, Marie of Burgundy. Category:French princesses Category:German princes and princesses Category:1420s births Category:1487 deaths
title: Mary of Cleves
